game.name: Hop Dont Stop
game.description:
Hop Dont Stop is a widely popular endless running game for kids. This is one of the best adventure games to play in your vacant periods. You can enjoy this awesome running game on both desktop and mobile phones. Your task is to keep your bunny moving in while avoiding the obstacles that come on your way. Do not forget to collect gems that would help you further to buy power-ups in this cool free online game.Â 

The fun will be endless when a cute little bunny and an endless racing track will meet each other. This addictive kids game is full of power-ups, diamonds and a number of abysses and obstacles. In order to score high in this flash game, do not forget to jump, duck, and swipe while running at the maximum possible speed on the racing track. Collecting diamonds from your way will help to improve your skills and utilize powerups to run much faster than any bunny before.

Hop Do not Stop is a free online game for boys game and sure to give you all the fun and excitement you have been seeking a racing game. When you play this online running game, you have to play the role of a cute rabbit who has to run as far as he can to survive. With the collection of delicious carrot that will come on your way, you will be able to increase your score and aid you in your endless hopping. Reach farther to score higher in this flash game. Play it today to beat your previous score!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE UP ON THE SCREEN TO JUMP, SWIPE DOWN TO BEND, SWIPE L-R TO MOVE L-R
game.webControlKeys: UP ARROW- JUMP, DOWN TO SWIPE, L-R ARROWS TO MOVE L-R
